embed.title: Discordsworn Help
embed.description: This is **Discordsworn**, a dice rolling bot for _[Ironsworn](https://www.ironswornrpg.com/)_ and other systems. Feel free to [report a bug](https://github.com/ribbanya/discordsworn/issues/new), [request a feature](https://github.com/ribbanya/discordsworn/issues/new), or [check out the code](https://github.com/ribbanya/discordsworn) on GitHub!

fields.name: Using Commands
fields.value:
To use a command, type `.` and then a command name from the list below.
```
.help ironsworn-action
```You can also ping <@468051091637010445> (without the `.`):
```
@Discordsworn#4327 help ironsworn-action
```â€¦ or directly message the bot:```help ironsworn-action```

fields.name: Using Aliases
fields.value:
Each command has one or more shorthand keywords, called aliases, that speed up the process of executing commands. For example, the following lines all do the same thing (get help with the **_Ironsworn_ Action Roll** command):
```
.help ironsworn-action``````
.? is
``````.h a```

fields.name:
Getting Help with Commands
`h`, `?`, `help`, `man`
fields.value: To find out what any command does and how to use it, type `.help` (or `.h`, `.?`, or `.man`) and then any alias of the command you wish to know more about: `.help ironsworn-action`

fields.name:
_Ironsworn_ Action Roll
`a`, `is`, `act`, `ironsworn-action`
fields.value: Performs an Action Roll from the [_Ironsworn_](https://www.ironswornrpg.com/) engine.

fields.name:
_Apocalypse World_ Move Roll
`m`, `aw`, `move`, `apocalypse-world-move`
fields.value: Performs a move from the [_Apocalypse World_](http://apocalypse-world.com/) engine.

fields.name:
Roll Any Dice
`m`, `aw`, `move`, `apocalypse-world-move`
fields.value: Performs a move from the [_Apocalypse World_](http://apocalypse-world.com/) engine.
